docs.snippet: Nigeria could be suspended by FIFA after the country’s soccer federation leaders were removed from office and the federation’s president was arrested upon returning from the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigeria could be suspended by FIFA after the country’s soccer federation leaders were removed from office and the federation’s president was arrested upon returning from the World Cup.

docs.snippet: Twice champions Argentina take on in-form Belgium in the World Cup quarter-finals before the Netherlands face surprise packages Costa Rica later on Saturday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Twice champions Argentina take on in-form Belgium in the World Cup quarter-finals before the Netherlands face surprise packages Costa Rica later on Saturday.

headline.main: Argentina Take on Belgium, Netherlands Face Costa Rica
headline.print_headline: Argentina Take on Belgium, Netherlands Face Costa Rica

docs.snippet: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations.
docs.lead_paragraph: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations.

headline.main: Brazil Shocked, Angered by Neymar's World Cup Injury
headline.print_headline: Brazil Shocked, Angered by Neymar's World Cup Injury

docs.snippet: Not even Keylor Navas could rescue Costa Rica this time.

docs.snippet: A stretch of coast between Punta del Este and José Ignacio is dotted with galleries and art-focused resorts.
docs.lead_paragraph: A stretch of coast between Punta del Este and José Ignacio is dotted with galleries and art-focused resorts.
docs.abstract: Stretch of coast between Uruguay's Punta del Este and Jose Ignacio is dotted with galleries and art-focused resorts, with Punta del Este quickly becoming a fresh destination for art lovers.

headline.main: An Art Scene by the Sea in Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Where the Art Scene Is on Point

docs.snippet: Members of Colombia's national soccer team have been welcomed home from the World Cup in Brazil with shouts of thanks from grateful compatriots.

headline.main: Colombia WCup Team Welcomed Home as Heroes
headline.print_headline: Colombia WCup Team Welcomed Home as Heroes

docs.snippet: The referee who failed to see Luis Suarez bite an opponent has been picked to officiate Brazil's World Cup semifinal against Germany.
docs.lead_paragraph: The referee who failed to see Luis Suarez bite an opponent has been picked to officiate Brazil's World Cup semifinal against Germany.

headline.main: Suarez Referee Picked for Brazil-Germany Semifinal
headline.print_headline: Suarez Referee Picked for Brazil-Germany Semifinal

docs.snippet: Argentine President Cristina Fernandez will miss her country's Independence Day celebrations this week to continue recovering from an acute throat infection.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentine President Cristina Fernandez will miss her country's Independence Day celebrations this week to continue recovering from an acute throat infection.

headline.main: Illness to Keep Argentine President From Holiday
headline.print_headline: Illness to Keep Argentine President From Holiday

docs.snippet: In order to join the ranks of the World Cup elite, countries like the United States need to incubate soccer talent.
docs.lead_paragraph: In order to join the ranks of the World Cup elite, countries like the United States need to incubate soccer talent.
docs.abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column offers his theory on why the World Cup is a highly exclusive club; checks out four semifinalists for 2014 World Cup, Argentina, Brazil, Netherlands and Germany and contends that insider soccer nations bestow a kind of permission to individual players to be audacious in manner and deed.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Soccer's Elite Sends the Party Crashers Home
headline.main: Semifinals Remain an Inner Sanctum Until Further Notice
headline.print_headline: Semifinals Remain an Inner Sanctum Until Further Notice

docs.snippet: FIFA will not take action against the Colombia player who injured Neymar and ended the Brazil star's World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA will not take action against the Colombia player who injured Neymar and ended the Brazil star's World Cup.

headline.main: FIFA Takes No Action Over Challenge on Neymar
headline.print_headline: FIFA Takes No Action Over Challenge on Neymar
